We offer complimentary shuttle service to the airport and within a 3-mile radius, including the Tanger Outlet Mall. You can also visit historic downtown Charleston, just 10 minutes away. The Crowne Plaza hotel is convenient to I-26 and I-526, making it easy access to Charleston’s rich history and tours or visits to one of South Carolina’s finest beaches: Folly Beach, Isle of Palms or Sullivan’s Island. Whether putting for par on the world-renowned golf courses in. Charleston or fishing and sailing, unforgettable experiences await every guest. The Crowne Plaza welcomes you to experience the ambiance of our upscale, modern lobby bar and lounge, offering comfortable conversation areas and a 52" HDTV. Mingle over to our outdoor patio and pool, and be sure to visit our Sweetgrass Restaurant.
